verbose_text: Stimulation of PBMCs from all pregnant goats at day 0 (prior to infection) with C. burnetii NM for 4 hours resulted in a slightly lower mRNA expression of TLR4, the mRNA expression of TLR1 and TLR6 was slightly up-regulated, and the expression of TLR2 mRNA was strongly up-regulated in comparison with unstimulated PBMCs (XREF_FIG).
